Person of the Year 
PD Dr. #ÖzlemTüreci and Prof. Dr. #UgurSahin, the co-founders of #BioNTech (the City of #Mainz based company in the Land of Rheinland-Pfalz / #Germany) and developers of the BioNTech-#Pfizer #vaccine for the #COVID19 via @derspiegel
